Reviews.Title: this camera is nice quilty is very good made
Reviews.Author: jhon
Reviews.Content: bought this camera for my family price is fair its new 14mp color is nice in person works great and so easy to sure and easy to carry with with me anywhere the zoom is works wells also good item

Reviews.Title: Super cute and fun
Reviews.Author: MarCole
Reviews.Content: Item was about the size of a credit card and was super cute.  Lots of cool features for a very small camera.  I expect to have lots of fun with this when I go hiking.

Reviews.Title: Its really cool for the price
Reviews.Author: Diukna
Reviews.Content: I took a picture of a duck that was moving on the water and the picture looks very clear, the colors, everything is awesome... I haven't try the videos yet but I guess it takes good videos tho. :)

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Camera worked well for the price. Took good pictures. Still learning. Hope there won't be a problem with this camera. Would not shut off after taking pictures of my first grand child at the hospital. I had to take battery out and then reinstall. Has worked fine since.

Reviews.Title: Handy Camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Russert
Reviews.Content: Absolutely LOVE the color (turquoise).  The size of the camera is great....small enough for any purse or pocket.  I cannot give it the full 5 stars for I have other cameras that actually take better pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, poor battery life
Reviews.Author: Tarynnnnn
Reviews.Content: If the battery life were better, this would be 5 stars. The battery only lasts a few hours & when it's not in use the battery still depletes & isn't worth taking on trips.

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: A. Huff
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace the Canon I've been using for the past few years. I had no occasion to use it the first 30 days, but recently started using it last month on vacation. Purchased it in May 2012. The green paint started chipping off. The shutter sticks closed when you turn it on. The shutter sticks open when you turn it off.It does take good photos-when it works properly.I tried contacting Amazon, Pentax, and the seller of the product for either a refund, or guidance on how to get a replacement or repair. None of my efforts have been successful. I am stuck with this piece of crap and wishing I had just spent more on the Canon.Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: my second digital camera
Reviews.Author: wisho_o
Reviews.Content: i love it!! very small and turquoise color :)the colors come out great ~there's these mini built in frames option in the camera very cute~!loving this camera!

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel sensor; wide-angle 5x optical zoom lens (28-140mm)
Sensor-shift Pentax Shake Reduction (SR) system; Movie SR keeps motion video steady
Capture widescreen 720p HD video
Elegant design with an ultra-compact footprint
Capture images/video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
Elegant design with an ultra-compact footprint, featuring soft curves, rounded edges, and a highly polished, reflective surface in chrome, black, or green.
High resolution 14 megapixel sensor ensures exceptional detail in large print sizes, and provides flexibility when cropping an image.
Wide angle 5X optical zoom lens (28-140mm) offers great framing flexibility for subjects near or far.
Sensor-shift PENTAX Shake Reduction (SR) system helps keep images tack sharp, even in dim lighting, while Movie SR keeps motion video steady.
Capture widescreen 720p HD video when a still image just isn't enough to record the essence of the scene.
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio 15936 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Green)
